description.en:
The Beginner Bosnian Language course introduces students to essential elements of the Bosnian language, focusing on practical communication skills. Students start by learning basic information about the Bosnian language and its historical development, proceed with the Bosnian Latin alphabet, and gain insight into basic stress patterns in the Bosnian language, emphasizing the importance of accurate pronunciation and phonetics. Vocabulary lessons cover common words and phrases useful for everyday interactions, such as greetings, introductions, and basic questions. Grammar instruction includes simple sentence structures, basic main and auxiliary verb conjugations, Bosnian language case systems, and common nouns and pronouns (personal, possessive, and demonstrative). Students practice forming sentences and using them in short dialogues through guided activities.
Reading and writing exercises help students gain confidence in recognizing and producing written Bosnian. Listening exercises expose students to native Bosnian language speakers, enhancing their ability to understand common conversational patterns. Cultural lessons introduce Bosnian traditions, etiquette, and social norms, preparing students for culturally appropriate communication. Students develop practical speaking skills by participating in role-play and other interactive activities. By the end of the course, students will be equipped to handle basic conversations and navigate everyday situations in Bosnian confidently.

objectives.en: This Beginner Bosnian language course aims to build foundational language skills for everyday communication. Students will learn basic vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation to engage in simple conversations and understand common phrases. The course includes reading and writing practice in the Bosnian Latin alphabet, with exercises designed to develop confidence in real-life situations (introductions, shopping,  visiting places and institutions, spatial and temporal orientation). Additionally, students will learn about the historical development of the Bosnian language, and the rich culture of Bosnia and Herzegovina acquiring basic customs and etiquette, enhancing both language proficiency and cultural understanding.
